fallback.pageNotFoundDesc: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you were looking for.
fallback.forbiddenDesc: Sorry, but you don't have permission to access this page.
fallback.internalErrorDesc: Sorry, but the server encountered an error.
fallback.offlineErrorDesc: Sorry, can't connect to the internet. Check your connection.
fallback.sureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?

http.requestTimeout: The request timed out. Please try again later.
http.networkError: A network error occurred. Please check your internet connection and try again.
http.badRequest: Bad Request. Please check your input and try again.
http.unauthorized: Unauthorized. Please log in to continue.
http.forbidden: Forbidden. You do not have permission to access this resource.
http.notFound: Not Found. The requested resource could not be found.
http.internalServerError: Internal Server Error. Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
http.errMsg401: The user does not have permission (token, user name, password error)!
http.errMsg403: The user is authorized, but access is forbidden!
http.errMsg404: Network request error, the resource was not found!
http.errMsg405: Network request error, request method not allowed!
http.errMsg500: Server error, please contact the administrator!
http.errMsg503: The service is unavailable, the server is temporarily overloaded or maintained!
http.errMsg505: The http version does not support the request!

widgets.checkUpdatesDescription: Click to refresh and get the latest version

authentication.loginSubtitle: Enter your account details to manage your projects
authentication.signUpSubtitle: Make managing your applications simple and fun
authentication.agreeTip: Please agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms
authentication.passwordStrength: Use 8 or more characters with a mix of letters, numbers & symbols
authentication.forgetPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you instructions to reset your password
authentication.qrcodeSubtitle: Scan the QR code with your phone to login
authentication.qrcodePrompt: Click 'Confirm' after scanning to complete login
authentication.codeSubtitle: Enter your phone number to start managing your project
authentication.loginAgainSubTitle: Your login session has expired. Please log in again to continue.
